title: AI-powered glasses help visually impaired 'see' surroundings
summary: A groundbreaking new wearable is allowing people with vision loss to identify objects and navigate more independently.

title: Major cities adopt smart traffic signals to ease congestion
summary: Urban centers across the globe are turning to AI-driven systems to reduce traffic jams and carbon emissions.

title: Startup launches solar-powered smartphone
summary: The eco-friendly device can charge completely using sunlight, designed for remote areas with limited electricity access.

title: Quantum computing: The next leap in cybersecurity
summary: Experts believe quantum encryption will reshape how we protect sensitive information online.

title: Can biodegradable batteries solve e-waste crisis?
summary: Researchers unveil sustainable energy cells made from paper and non-toxic materials.

title: Tech giants join forces to fight deepfake misinformation
summary: Google, Meta, and Microsoft pledge to develop verification tools and watermarking standards.

title: How drone delivery is reshaping healthcare in rural India
summary: Remote villages now receive critical medicine and vaccines via AI-guided drones.

title: Smart farming: Robots now harvest delicate fruits
summary: New robotic arms equipped with AI are picking strawberries faster and with less damage than human hands.

title: Can brain-computer interfaces make telepathy real?
summary: Neuralink and other startups are experimenting with devices that allow direct communication via brain signals.
